SELECT cor.COR_NAME corName, re.Announcement announcement , re.announcement_Code announcementCode, re.RECEIPT_END receiptEndDate from CORPORATION_INFO cor, Recruitment re where cor.COR_CODE = re.COR_CODE and re.RECEIPT_END >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
and (cor.cor_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or re.announcement like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
order by announcement desc , corName desc
